name: ai-call-manager
description: AI-Powered Outbound Calling System using Synthflow API - Python Flask Application

scripts.build: echo 'This is a Python Flask application. Use: pip install -r requirements.txt && python app.py'
scripts.test: python -m pytest tests/ || echo 'No tests directory found. This is a Python project.'

note: This is a Python Flask application. The main dependencies are listed in requirements.txt, not here.
